A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the only time I've ever felt compelled to add a rating for a movie on this site. I felt I had to do it because of how terrible the movie was. After TFA(which I thought was just ok) I was very excited to see how they would reveal a lot of the questions that were left unanswered. Boy was I wrong\, as this movie managed to throw all that out to the dumpster and decided to seemingly forget what had just happened in the previous movie. The plot was ridiculous( a slow speed space chase)\, full of holes and things the made absolutely no sense. They managed to destroy what Luke Skywalker and many other things had been for decades. This is by far\, the worst star wars to come out.
